template.description: Template to transform the data into a Fiware model and send it to the Context Broker
template.name: JSON_based_transformation_upload_CB

processGroups.comments: Template to transform the data into a Fiware model and send it to the Context Broker

labels.label: Save the ID field to an attribute to use it later
Transform the JSON to comply with the fiware standar. Replace special characters in the ID field
Split the list of JSON received (From the REST API we get a list, not a single JSON)

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

labels.label: Send GET request to Fiware API to check if the id already exists
Add the type attribute to the JSON
If the ID is not already in fiware, create a new entity
Update the entity in fiware with the new data
If the ID is in fiware, delete the ID field from the JSON
